full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN PO PO DHI SATV'I GRIB BSIL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES YUNG DKAR GYIS BRANG CING, YI DAM GYI SNGAGS KYI BSHAM DU SUMBHA NI DRAG TU BRJOD PAS BSKRAD, GLUD RGYANG RING POR BSKYAL, PHYI MIG MI BLTA BAR 'OD, YID CHES PA'I GNAS SU GYUR BA'I GRIB BSIL 'DI NI MKHAN PO PODHI SATVA'I MDZAD PA'O, ,DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI GRIB BYANG ZHING DAG PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,DGE'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
